notes: The PO_LINES_ALL table is a core component of the Purchasing module in Oracle EBS. It captures detailed, line-level information for each purchase order, covering the items/services being purchased, ordered quantities, prices, and tax-related details. Each PO can have multiple lines, with each line representing a unique item or service. It provides full traceability for procurement transactions and integrates with downstream processes such as receiving, invoicing, and accounting. Key columns include PO_LINE_ID (primary key), ITEM_ID (FK to item master), QUANTITY, UNIT_PRICE, UOM fields, PROMISED_DATE (supplier commitment), and TAX-related attributes. The table links closely with PO_HEADERS_ALL (header-level info), PO_LINE_LOCATIONS_ALL (delivery details), PO_DISTRIBUTIONS_ALL (accounting), and MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B (item master).
